results.title: Anti-tumor effects of mevalonate pathway inhibition in ovarian cancer
results.text_hl: @CELLLINE_CVCL:1304 @@@IGROV-1@@@ and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0134 @@@A2780@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian cancer@@@ cell lines were treated with increasing concentrations of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Zoledronic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077211 @@@zoledronic acid@@@.

results.title: Mutant p53 murine oviductal epithelial cells induce progression of high-grade serous carcinoma and are most sensitive to simvastatin therapy in vitro and in vivo
results.text_hl: In vivo, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ induced @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian cancer disease@@@ regression through decreased primary @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian tumor@@@ weight and increased apoptosis.

results.title: Statins decrease the expression of c-Myc protein in cancer cell lines.
results.text_hl: Here, we carried out a comprehensive analysis of the effects of three statins, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, on six different @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ cell lines that include a @GENE_ABCB1 @GENE_5243 @@@P-glycoprotein@@@-expressing, multidrug resistant variant of an @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian cancer@@@ cell line.

results.title: Statin-mediated reduction of osteopontin expression induces apoptosis and cell growth arrest in ovarian clear cell carcinoma.
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian clear cell carcinoma@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@OCCC@@@) cells in vitro and in vivo and elucidated the mechanism of drug action.

results.title: Simvastatin reduces tumor cell adhesion to human peritoneal mesothelial cells by decreased expression of VCAM-1 and beta1 integrin.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ significantly reduced the adhesion of all @<m>DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@ovarian cancer@@@ cells and @CELLLINE_CVCL:0320 @@@HT29@@@ to HMCs (P<=0.001).
